data.name: 攻坚模组

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值全满的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>3%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值全满的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>4%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值全满的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>6%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>80%</color>的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>8%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>80%</color>的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>10%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>60%</color>的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>12%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>60%</color>的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>14%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 攻坚模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects:
攻击耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>60%</color>的目标时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>18%</color>；
若未击破部位则会发动<buf ID=900001>[追击]</buf>，造成<color=#F74848>0.25</color>倍伤害

data.introduce: 搭载攻坚模组的机兵往往都是队伍的第一个攻击者，他们的任务就是击碎对方完好的护甲，为整个团队打开局面。
